movies.title: Heavenly Forest
movies.plot: Heavenly Forest is About a Photographer name Makoto who travels to New York during Christmas to look for his best friend, Shizuru. The two first met when Makoto attended his University Entrance Ceremony. Due to his Inferiority Complex, Makoto tends to shy away other people but Shizuru managed to Make him open up to her. Because of their friendship, Shizuru also ended up taking interest in photography and the two often went to the forest to take pictures. Shizuru wants nothing else but to be by Makoto's side so when he started liking another girl called Miyuki , Shizuru decided that she too will like Miyuki and becomes her friend . One day , Makoto asked Shizuru what present she'd like to receive for her Birthday. Shizuru , who want to enter a photography competition, had an idea to take a picture of the two of them kissing in a forest. Makoto agreed to do this and the two kissed for the very first time. Ever since that day, however, Shizuru ups and disappears from Makoto's life.
movies.simplePlot: Heavenly Forest is About a Photographer name Makoto who travels to New York during Christmas to look for his best friend, Shizuru. The two first met when Makoto attended his University ...

biography.bio: Aoi Miyazaki was born on November 30, 1985 in Tokyo, Japan. She is an actress, known for Les enfants loups, Ame & Yuki (2012), The Great Passage (2013) and Eureka (2000). She was previously married to Sôsuke Takaoka.
biography.name: Aoi Miyazaki

biography.bio: Hiroshi Tamaki was born on January 14, 1980 in Nagoya, Japan. He is an actor, known for Waterboys (2001), Heavenly Forest (2006) and The Assassins (2012).
biography.name: Hiroshi Tamaki

biography.bio: Munetaka Aoki was born on March 14, 1980 in Yao, Osaka, Japan. He is an actor, known for Hara-Kiri: mort d'un samourai (2011), Silence (2016) and Kenshin Kyoto Inferno (2014). He has been married to Yuhka since June 27, 2016.
biography.name: Munetaka Aoki

biography.bio: Saori Ban is an actress, known for Heavenly Forest (2006).
biography.name: Saori Ban

biography.bio: Keisuke Koide was born on February 20, 1984 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor, known for Cyborg Girl (2008), Kisaragi (2007) and Feel the Wind (2009).
biography.name: Keisuke Koide

biography.bio: Meisa Kuroki was born on May 28, 1988 in Okinawa, Japan as Satsuki Shimabukuro. She is an actress, known for Vexille (2007), Space Battleship Yamato (2010) and Crows Zero (2007). She has been married to Jin Akanishi since February 2, 2012. They have one child.
biography.name: Meisa Kuroki

biography.bio: Yoshiyuki Morishita was born on December 4, 1962 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor, known for Kill Bill: Vol. 2 (2004), Kill Bill: Vol. 1 (2003) and The Grudge (2004).
biography.name: Yoshiyuki Morishita

biography.bio: Yûya Ogawa was born in Tosa, Kochi, Japan. He is an actor, known for The Ramen Girl (2008), Heavenly Forest (2006) and Kisshô Tennyo (2007).
biography.name: Yûya Ogawa

biography.bio: Asae Ohnishi was born on November 16, 1983 in Japan. She is an actress, known for 1 Litre of Tears (2005), Heavenly Forest (2006) and Detective Story (2007).
biography.name: Asae Ohnishi

biography.bio: Misa Uehara was born on December 21, 1983 in Maibara, Japan as Tsuguki Hori. She is an actress, known for Ju-on: The Grudge (2002), The Battery (2007) and Atenshon purîzu supesharu: Ôsutoraria Shidonî hen (2008).
biography.name: Misa Uehara

camera: Sony CineAlta HDW-F900, Fujinon Cine Super E Series Lenses
